title: Market share of leading companies in the coffee market in Germany 2016
summary: In 2016 , 23.2 % of Market package deliveries in the leading were for Coffee to consumer ( Nestlé ) parcels .
The remaining Market share was split between Coffee to ( Tchibo ) and consumer to ( Jacobs_Douwe_Egberts ) deliveries .
Nestlé e-commerce The size of the Nestlé parcel share market is likely attributable to online retailing .
gold: This statistic illustrates the market share of leading companies in the German coffee market in 2016 . In the period of consideration , Tchibo had a market share of 12 percent .
